1.title: Lifting the Mask
1.plot: In 1986 the body of Patrice LaBlanc surfaces in a Texas Lake. She's been stabbed 39 times. Her boyfriend Cliff Youens, also known as drag queen Brandi West is found guilty. For the first time, Cliff confesses his crime to Candice DeLong, and the public.

2.title: The Perfect Victim
2.plot: New Year's Eve, 1975, ends a terrible year for Sarah 'Cindy' White, but it's the beginning of the rest of her life behind bars. She set fire to a house and killed a family of six. Candice DeLong unravels years of abuse, but can it ever justify murder?

3.title: A Fatal Attraction
3.plot: Florida, 1995, an elderly lady and her care taker are murdered in a home invasion. Earl Linebaugh and Melissa Harris are found guilty and sentenced to life with no parole. But Melissa says she's a victim too. Candice DeLong will know if she's lying.

4.title: Gone Too Soon
4.plot: Baby Dylan was 3 months old when his mother, Alexandra Tobias shook him to death. She claims it was an accident but was found guilty of second degree murder and sentenced to 50 years. Candice DeLong digs deeper to find out what made this young mom snap.

5.title: A Craigslist Killer
5.plot: In 2009, a NY newsman is discovered stabbed in his bedroom. George Weber met his killer, 16 year old John Katehis on Craigslist. John got more than he bargained for when 'smothering' turned sexual, and then, deadly. Candice DeLong will hear from John.

6.title: Death by Stiletto
6.plot: A night ends in tragedy when Stefan Andersson is bludgeoned to death by girlfriend Ana Trujillo - and her 5 inch stiletto heel. She claims self defense but a jury found her guilty of murder. Candice Delong wants to know what turned her into a killer.

7.title: The Angel of Death
7.plot: In 2 months, 20 patients at a Texas hospital are murdered. Nurse Vickie Jackson, on duty at every attack, she is sentenced to life with no parole. She now says she's innocent and knows who the real killer is. Candice DeLong will face the 'Angle of Death.'

8.title: The Prime Suspect
8.plot: New Year's Eve in Pampa, Texas ends in triple homicide. Twila Busby and her two adult sons are found dead in their home. Her boyfriend Hank Skinner is later found guilty. He says he's innocent. Candice DeLong wants to find out the truth.

9.title: Killing One's Own
9.plot: November, 2001 in Fort Worth, Texas, Loyd and Agnes Courtney were beaten and stabbed to death by their daughter, Deborah Pieringer. Prosecutors say it was for money, but Deborah says she didn't do it. Could she be innocent? Candice DeLong will find out.

10.title: Teen Terrors
10.plot: In 2004 the body of Stephen Schulhoff was found beaten to death by a baseball bat. His daughter Courtney Schulhoff, 16, and her boyfriend are found guilty and sentenced to life with no parole. But, who swung the bat? Candice DeLong finds out the truth.

1.title: For Love of Oneself
1.plot: Susan Grund found her husband dead in their home, saying it was a burglary gone wrong. But the story didn't add up. Susan Grund was found guilty of murder and sentenced to 60 years in jail. Now she tells her story to former FBI profiler Candace DeLong.

2.title: Daddy's Little Girl
2.plot: Belinda Van Krevel has spent her life surrounded by murder. When her own father is killed, police question Belinda's connection to the crime. When Belinda tells her tells her story to former FBI profiler Candice DeLong, it shocks Candice to her core.

3.title: Love Before Life
3.plot: Jennifer Reali was having a wild affair with Brian Hood, he made her shoot his wife to death in a parking lot. She did, and now she is serving life in prison. Former FBI profiler Candice Delong talks face to face with Jennifer to find out the truth.

4.title: Disorder of Affection
4.plot: Jennifer Hyatte is a bubbly blonde with a love of horses, so how could she, a nurse, fall in love with a dangerous criminal, and end up in a shoot-out to get him out of jail? Former FBI profiler Candice DeLong discovers the truth about this tragic tale.

1.title: Horseplay and Hired Guns
1.plot: In 2005, Patricia Olsen found her husband Neil Olsen, dead inside the barn where he kept his horse Hannah, trampled to death. But investigators soon find evidence of foul play. Is Patricia telling the truth, or, is she involved in her husband's death?

2.title: Fatal Fortune Hunter
2.plot: Celeste Beard Johnson knew she had hit the jackpot when she met millionaire TV executive Steven Beard. When Steven is shot, ballistics lead police to Tracey Tarlton, Celeste's lesbian lover. A bizarre tale of sex, lies, money and murder.

3.title: A Nail in the Coffin
3.plot: Dawn Silvernail fell into a relationship with a dangerous, controlling man who ordered her to kill. Dawn is now a convicted murderer, in jail. Former FBI profiler Candice DeLong wants to discover the truth. Where did it all go wrong for Dawn Silvernail?

4.title: Homicidal Honeymooner
4.plot: 20-year-old Ashley Humphrey kills Sandee Rozzo. But Ashley claims it was her new husband, Tracey, who wanted Sandee dead, so he got his new wife, Ashley, to kill her. From her prison in Florida, Ashley talks to Former FBI profiler Candice DeLong.

5.title: The Black Widow Bride
5.plot: Greed is one of the oldest motives for murder, and these deadly women are no exception. They'll do anything to satisfy their need for cash. They stalk their victims throughout society - rich and poor. This is the dangerous world of Fortune Tellers.

6.title: Teenage Terror
6.plot: 18-year-old Sarah Luderman is stabbed to death by 19-year-old Rachel Wade. The two were fighting over a boy and months of rivalry end in a deadly rumble. From her Prison in Florida, Rachel tells Former FBI profiler Candice DeLong her side of the story.

1.title: Stripped Bare
1.plot: When Melissa Vanover meets millionaire jewelry salesman, Michael Nieman, she thinks she has found her knight in shining armor. When Nieman is found shot dead police suspect a break in only later to find the trigger man wasn't only after the money.

2.title: Friends 'til the End
2.plot: Shirley Jo Phillips suspects her best friend Wilma Plaster of stealing, and things turn sour. Police find Wilma's dismembered body and Shirley Jo is suspect #1. Is this a case of an innocent woman wrongly convicted? Is she protecting someone else?

3.title: Victim of Love
3.plot: Tyonne Palmer wanted the perfect family. She hit the jackpot with boyfriend, Pastor Tracy Burleson. Trouble is, the Pastor is still married! So when the Pastor's wife turns up dead, all eyes are on Tyonne. Is she a pawn in the dangerous game of murder?

4.title: Teen Killers
4.plot: Mother of two Susan Bailey is found dead in her own home with 27 stab wounds to her body. Her 17-year-old daughter Jennifer and Jennifer's 16-year-old boyfriend Paul Henson are found guilty of murder and sentence to 60 years.

5.title: A Mother's Love
5.plot: When a gang of teenagers approaches her Texan home in search of her only son, Debbie Fleming leaps to his defense and shoots a 16-year-old dead. Was this a simple case of self-defense gone wrong? Or were these the actions of a cold-blooded killer?

6.title: Caught in the Crossfire
6.plot: The custody battle over a young girl gets out of control when her father John Blattner is shot twice and dies. His ex-wife Jennifer and her new husband Kevin Bowen both plead guilty. What really happened on that fateful night?

1.title: In the Name of Love
1.plot: Laurie Kellogg was just a teenager when she moved in with a man twice her age, Bruce Kellogg. After 11 years of marriage she snapped. She convinced four teenagers from her neighborhood to kill Bruce. Did Laurie really mastermind the entire murder?

2.title: Protecting Your Own
2.plot: Tyra Whitney killed her daughter Tashira's boyfriend, LeMarcus Bell,with a hammer. LeMarcus died from his injuries shortly thereafter, and the State charged Tyra with murder.

3.title: Blue Collar Bludgeoning
3.plot: When Danny Pelosi starts having an affair with socialite Generosa Ammon he thinks he's won the lottery. Months later Generosa's husband Ted turns up dead. Danny is found guilty but says someone else did it. Now, he's ready to tell Candice the truth.

4.title: A Military Affair
4.plot: Kimberly Parker is convicted of masterminding the July 2000 kidnapping and murder of her estranged husband, Elihue Parker. She was sentenced to 99 years for aggravated kidnapping. She admits guilt but wasn't there when the trigger was pulled.

5.title: Paradise Lost
5.plot: It took police 10 years to unravel a convoluted murder-for-hire plot involving three junkies and a callous hit man, who all fingered Ronald Samuels as the mastermind to his ex-wife's murder. He was sentenced to life in prison.

6.title: Friendly Fire
6.plot: Sylvilla Humphrey shot her friend, Ercell Minix in the neck, at the beauty salon where she worked. The victim's son, 5 at the time, is now NBA star Kendrick Perkins. He was raised by his grandparents.

7.title: Bloody Murder
7.plot: Ernesto Ivan Martinez, 21, had been living with 59-year-old Barry Horn and they are believed to have been lovers until a falling out. Horn was found brutally stabbed to death at his home. Martinez was eventually sentenced to life in prison for murder.

8.title: Sex, Drugs & Rock 'n' Roll
8.plot: In 1989, Charles Dean Hood was working for wealthy businessman Ronald Williamson. He also lived in Williamson's home with him and his girlfriend Tracie Lynn Wallace. All was well, until a gruesome double murder changed everything.

10.title: The Woods Strangler
10.plot: Electrician Larry Swearingen is found guilty of the murder of 19 year-old college student Melissa Trotter and now sits on death row. Is an innocent man going to die - while the real killer remains free? Or is it a case of forensic evidence gone wrong?

imdb.title: Facing Evil
plot: Former FBI profiler Candice DeLong interviews convicted killers from prison about their crimes.::ellybendi
